trigger.name: DynamoDB - Consumed Read Capacity Units Reached Upper Limit!!!!
DynamoDB - Consumed Write Capacity Units Reached Upper Limit!!!!
DynamoDB - Read Capacity Units Usage Rate is over {$TRG_BBD_DDB_RED_CAP_RAT_THS_AVG}%!!
DynamoDB - Read Capacity Units Usage Rate is over {$TRG_BBD_DDB_RED_CAP_RAT_THS_WRN}%!!
DynamoDB - Throttled Requests Occurred!!!!
DynamoDB - Write Capacity Units Usage Rate is over {$TRG_BBD_DDB_WRT_CAP_RAT_THS_AVG}%!!
DynamoDB - Write Capacity Units Usage Rate is over {$TRG_BBD_DDB_WRT_CAP_RAT_THS_WRN}%!!
General - Blackbird DynamoDB plugin is not sending data!!!!
Operation - BatchGetItem Average Latency is over {$TRG_BBD_DDB_BAT_GET_LTC_THC_AVG} milliseconds!!
